title: Convert Outsiders into Insiders
description: D.A. Abrams, managing director of the CFP Board's Center for Financial Planning, discusses how teams of the future will be more representative and what advisors can do now to promote diversity.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: D.A. Abrams, managing director of the CFP Board's Center for Financial Planning, discusses how teams of the future will be more representative and what advisors can do now to promote diversity.
content:encoded: D.A. Abrams, managing director of the CFP Board's Center for Financial Planning, discusses how teams of the future will be more representative and what advisors can do now to promote diversity.
